content:
Agenda for next Tuesday's Mar 24, 2020 - 02:00 PM (Eastern Time, GMT -04 DST) OO on FHIR call

ObservationDefinition Trackers:

Jira Issue Summary

  1. J#26603 define single way to define target population for all measures
  2. J#25730 Observation: Reference range units
  3. J#22643 ObservationDefinition conformant to the Definition pattern
  4. J#20492 Update and fix ObservationDefinition example
  5. J#18995 Use proper datatype for the value sets of ObservationDefinition
